entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump I’m too busy supporting my friend, whose only daughter — aged 29  — DIED of COVID19 on 4/28 — ALL thanks to YOUR complete incompetence & mismanagement of preparing the USA for the incoming pandemic. The family celebrated what would have been her 30th birthday on 5/18. FU, Donald.
